name: Code Runner
description: Run code snippet or code file for multiple languages

name: ES7 React-Snippets
description: JavaScript and React/Redux snippets in ES7+ with Babel plugin features

name: ESLint
description: Code and Rule editor for VS Code (Mandatory Usage)

name: Live Preview
description: An extension that hosts a local server for you to preview your web projects

name: Live Server
description: Launch a local development server with live reload features for static & dynamic pages

name: Live Share
description: Real-time collaborative development from the comfort of your favorite tools

name: Postman
description: Postman enables you to develop and test  your APIs in Postman directly from VS Code

name: Quokka
description: A developer productivity tool for viewing runtime values in your IDE next to your code

name: Quokka Statusbar Buttons
description: Adds buttons to the status bar in VS Code to control Quokka

name: Prettier
description: An opinionated code formatter enforcing strict conditions through formatting and wrapping your code
